DirectAccountId.title: Direct Account Name
DirectAccountId.description: This is Direct Account Id. User will provide account names then Find account Id by running query by its name

InDirectAccountId.title: Indirect Account Name
InDirectAccountId.description: This is Indirect Account Id. User will provide account names then Find account Id by running query by its name

SapAgreementNumber.title: SapAgreementNumber
SapAgreementNumber.description: This is unique text which identify Pricing Agreement Record. Use this to link Spa Request with Agreements.
